scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/localization/data dist/localization/ && npx pkg .
scripts.build:linux: tsc && cp -r src/localization/data dist/localization/ && npx pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output release/ssh-manager-linux
scripts.build:linux:pub: tsc && cp -r src/localization/data dist/localization/ && npx pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output release/ssh-manager
scripts.install:linux: test -f release/ssh-manager && sudo mv release/ssh-manager /usr/local/bin/ssh-manager && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/ssh-manager && echo '✅ ssh-manager установлен в /usr/local/bin' || (echo 'Ошибка: Сначала выполните: npm run build:linux:pub' && exit 1)
scripts.build:windows: tsc && cp -r src/localization/data dist/localization/ && npx pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output release/ssh-manager-win.exe
scripts.build:windows:win32: tsc && xcopy /E /I /Y src\localization\data dist\localization\data && npx pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output release/ssh-manager-win.exe
scripts.build:macos: tsc && cp -r src/localization/data dist/localization/ && npx pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output release/ssh-manager-macos
